summary: Email correspondence between individuals discussing the status of evidence processing in the Epstein case, specifically tracking device IDs and spreadsheets related to evidence from New York City. The email references comparing spreadsheets, confirming additional devices, and noting drives still being processed.

events.title: Evidence Status Update Email Exchange
events.description: Email exchange discussing the status of evidence processing in the Epstein case, including comparison of spreadsheets, identification of additional devices, and confirmation of received drives.

keyFacts: Email discusses tracking and processing of evidence devices in the Epstein case, specifically referencing New York City evidence.
Identifies three additional devices not on a prior spreadsheet: NYCO24328, NYCO24367, and NYCO27910.
Notes that some drives are still being processed, including NYCO24376 through 380 and several in NYCO24395.
References a color-coded spreadsheet used to track evidence status.
Indicates ongoing evidence processing and coordination between parties involved in the investigation.
